column5: Is there a drive in lodge with a remote sight on any of these bodies of water, I have to believe that we could save the cost of a flight from Nakina by driving to the lake.
I googled ara lake, according to the website, it is a fly-in, same with meta.
I am not aware of any but you can try www.noto.net or www.nomap.ca (this site was not working recently) and see what comes up.

I have been to all three, and there are no public access roads into them. They are indeed fly-in lakes. We, 8 of us are flying into Brace Lake at the end of August. Excellent fishing and hunting. Best deal in the area with some fine owners. 22-days and counting.
